original_title: 2023 A/L exams to conclude before Christmas: Minister
original_body_lines: Education Minister Susil Premajayantha, while addressing the delays in conducting examinations, said the 2023 GCE Advanced Level examinations will be held prior to Christmas day.

“The A/L exams which were to be held in August this year, will be held in December. The idea is to finish the 2023 exams by the end of this year. However, the 2023 Ordinary Level examinations will have to be held next year,” he said.
